statement.p: Consider the note B3 which has frequency 246.942 Hz.
What is the period for B3?
What is the wavelength for B3? ft
Recall that the speed of sound is 1116 feet per second.
These are scientific measurements; round accordingly.

solution.p: Period is the inverse of frequency, so \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{246.942}}\approx{0.0040495338986483}\approx{0.00404953}.
Wavelength is a unit conversion: \displaystyle\frac{{{1116}\ \text{ ft}}}{{\text{second}}}\cdot\frac{{{1}\ \text{ second}}}{{{246.942}\ \text{ cycles}}}\approx{4.5192798308915}\approx{4.519}.
